### Abstract of my first cool idea {-}

Natural disaster preperation can be the difference between life and death for a city's citizens. The prediction model will utilize additional sensors and industry leading professional to improve prediction abilities. The sensors will gather the necessary information required for the models to provide a best estimate of where and when a natural disaster will occur. 

### Abstract of my second cool idea {-}

The Making Grocery Shopping easy application will provide users with options to save money and/or time with their grocery shoppping. The application will provide recommendations where to shop, and if the user is willing to visit multiple stores, a path to the most cost savings.
